privacy_police_title: APPLICATION PRIVACY POLICY DETECT AND SOLVE
privacy_police_one_section_description: The purpose of this Privacy Policy is to inform Detect and Solve users about the collection, use and protection of their personal data, ensuring transparency and compliance with applicable legislation, including the General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law No. 13,709/2018).
privacy_police_fifth_section_description: Detect and Solve adopts technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of stored information, protecting it against unauthorized access, loss or leaks.
privacy_police_seventh_section_descripti: This Privacy Policy may be modified at any time. The user will be notified in case of significant changes.
use_terms_title: DETECT AND SOLVE APPLICATION TERMS OF USE
use_terms_one_section_description:
The purpose of these Terms of Use is to establish the rules and conditions for the use of the Detect and Solve application, a platform intended for the management of private and public incidents, allowing users to register, store and share relevant information, including images and videos, for the purposes of analysis and forwarding to public authorities and private entities. 
 By using the application, the user expressly agrees to the terms set forth herein. If the user does not agree, they must refrain from using the service.
use_terms_second_section_description:
For the purposes of these Terms, the following are considered: 
 User: any person who registers or uses the services of the Detect and Solve application Solve. 
 Occurrence: any event registered by the user on the platform. 
 Content: any and all information entered on the platform, including images, videos, texts and other data. 
 Personal Data: any information related to an identified or identifiable natural person. 
 Competent Authority: government agencies, private companies and other entities that may receive and process registered occurrences.
use_terms_fourth_section_description:
4.1. Personal data will be processed as described in the Privacy Policy. 

 4.2. The user may request the deletion of their data by formally requesting it from the application administration, except when there is a legal obligation to maintain it.
use_terms_fifth_section_description:
5.1. The user acknowledges that Detect and Solve acts only as an intermediary for the registration of occurrences, and is not responsible for the investigation or resolution of reported events. 

 5.2. The user undertakes to use the application in an ethical, lawful and responsible manner, ensuring that the information entered is true and does not cause harm to third parties.
use_terms_sixth_section_description: These Terms may be modified at any time, and it is the user's responsibility to check for updates regularly. Continued use of the application after modifications implies acceptance of the new conditions.
use_terms_seventh_section_description: For questions, requests or complaints, the user may contact us via email: {count}.
help_title: DETECT AND SOLVE APPLICATION HELP SECTION
help_description: If you need support to use the Detect and Solve application, see the frequently asked questions below or contact us.
help_one_section_description:
Access the application and click on 'New Incident'. 
 Choose the category (accident, theft, structural failure, etc.). 
 Enter a detailed description and upload images or videos. 
 Send the incident for analysis and monitoring.
help_second_section_title: 2. HOW TO FOLLOW THE STATUS OF INCIDENTS?
help_second_section_description:
Access the 'My Incidents' tab. 
 Check the updated status and any referrals. 
 If necessary, edit or add more information.
help_third_section_description:
Check your privacy settings within the application. 
 Do not share sensitive personal information unnecessarily. 
 Use the anonymous reporting feature when applicable.
help_fourth_section_description: If you need help, please contact us at: {count}.
delete_profile_description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? By confirming, your account will be permanently deleted and you will no longer be able to access the platform.
change_email_description: Are you sure you want to change your account data? By confirming, your account will be permanently changed and if you change your email you will be logged out of the platform for security reasons.
no_manager_found: No manager registered in the company, to create an area you need to register managers first.
unauthorized_title: You do not have the necessary permissions!
unauthorized_description: You do not have permissions to access this Detect and Solve management dashboard. If you believe this is an error, please contact us at: {count}.
unauthenticated_description: To access this page, you need to log in first.
